window.name: Generic Overview
window.help: Generic Overview: Left click to select things, right click to target them. Colour indicator on the right shows relation (green = friendly, red = hostile, gray = neutral, blue = mixed

window.name: Combat Log
window.help: Combat Log: List of recent events.

window.name: Component Overview
window.help: Component Overview: List of equipped components. Double click to activate (weapons need you to have things targeted). Yellow text means activated, blue means some in the stack are activated, but not all.

window.name: Hostile Component Overview
window.help: Component Overview (target): List of equipped components on the targeted objects.

window.name: Selection Status
window.help: Selection Status: Displays the average health of all selected items.

window.name: Target Status
window.help: Target Status: Displays the average health of all targeted items.

window.name: Inventory
window.help: Inventory: List of things in the inventories of the selected ships. Double click to use/equip, right click to drop (Z loots, in case you drop something nice).
